message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $95 for the product. Please let me know if this is possible.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $105.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I see, Alice. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
